definition: Job's tears plant (Coix lacryma-jobi)/Chinese pearl barley

sentences.english: Study on Extraction and Separation of Lactone for Coix Lachrymajobi L.
sentences.chinese: 薏苡內酯的提取及分離純化條件的研究。

sentences.english: Degumming of coix lachryma-jobi seeds miscella(CLSM)was studied by using ceramic ultrafiltration (UF) membrane.
sentences.chinese: 研究了陶瓷膜在薏苡仁混合油脫膠中的應用。

sentences.english: Green Bean, Coix Seed, sweet root, sago.
sentences.chinese: 綠豆，薏苡仁，甘草，西谷米。

sentences.english: The purified polysaccharides were analyzed by UV spectroscopy to contain neither protein nor nucleic acids.
sentences.chinese: 紫外掃描結果顯示薏苡仁多糖中不含核酸和蛋白質。
